keyEvents.description: The final battle against Captain Kuro and the Black Cat Pirates concludes with Luffy defeating Kuro and Usopp defeating Jango.
keyEvents.significance: Saves the village from Kuro's scheme and protects Kaya's life and fortune.

keyEvents.description: The remaining Black Cat Pirates take their defeated captain and flee the island, ending their threat to Syrup Village.
keyEvents.significance: Returns peace to the village after the pirate attack.

keyEvents.description: The villagers decide to keep the pirate attack secret to maintain their peace of mind, reasoning that pirates do not normally come to such an out-of-the-way village.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the village's desire to return to normalcy and forget the traumatic event.

keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates depart Syrup Village aboard the Going Merry with their new crewmate Usopp.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the Syrup Village arc as the heroes move on to their next adventure.

statusChanges.description: Village is saved from Kuro's scheme and returns to peace.

name: Going Merry
description: A caravel-class ship designed by Merry and gifted to the Straw Hat Pirates by Kaya. Features a sheep figurehead and becomes the crew's first proper vessel.

keyEvents.description: The Going Merry is revealed for the first time, designed by Merry and owned by Kaya.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the ship that will become the Straw Hats' home for hundreds of episodes.

keyEvents.description: Kaya gifts the Going Merry to the Straw Hat Pirates as gratitude for saving her life and village. Merry personally stocks it and explains its workings to the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The crew acquires their first proper ship, enabling them to truly begin their journey. The Going Merry serves as their vessel until the end of the Enies Lobby arc.

keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates board the Going Merry with their new member Usopp and depart Syrup Village to continue their journey.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the Going Merry's journey with the Straw Hats.
